flawed_nl_solution:
Walter has 1/4 * 56 bananas = <<1/4*56=224/1>>224/1 fewer bananas.
If Jefferson has 56 bananas, then Walter has 56 bananas - 224/1 bananas = <<56-224/1=-168>>-168 bananas
When they combine their bananas, they have a total of -168 bananas + 56 bananas = <<-168+56=-112>>-112 bananas.
After dividing the bananas equally, Walter gets -112 bananas/2 = <<-112/2=-56>>-56 bananas
#### -56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 224/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
